scripts.docker:full:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.full.yml --profile full up -d --build
scripts.docker:full:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.full.yml --profile full down
scripts.docker:full:logs: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.full.yml --profile full logs -f postgres api web
